trans-unit.source: Represents a find request sent by a client.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindRequestContext"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindRequestContext"> </xref> 사용 하 여 지정 된 클래스 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Enables the discovery service to send results back to the client as they are received.
trans-unit.target: 검색 서비스를를 받을 때 클라이언트에 결과 보낼 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint discovery metadata to send back to the client.
trans-unit.target: 클라이언트로 다시 보낼 끝점 검색 메타 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindRequestContext"></xref> sent by the client.
The find criteria sent by the client.

Called after the user adds an endpoint to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindRequestContext"></xref> by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindRequestContext.AddMatchingEndpoint*>.
trans-unit.target: 사용자에 대 한 끝점을 추가 하는 후에 호출 된 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindRequestContext"> </xref> <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindRequestContext.AddMatchingEndpoint*>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindRequestContext.AddMatchingEndpoint*> 를 호출 하 여

trans-unit.source: The endpoint discovery metadata to send back to the client.
trans-unit.target: 클라이언트로 다시 보낼 끝점 검색 메타 데이터입니다.
